welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Hilliard, where small-town charm meets big-city opportunities. Get ready to experience our friendly community, delicious local cuisine, and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Hilliard has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ohio State University Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Port Columbus International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Port Columbus International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Port Columbus International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rickenbacker Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rickenbacker Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
